about_the_game:
The Survivors Expansion Map :

the game map is growing by 30%, the map is already under construction, it offers to expand and diversify the game experience

this part of the map will allow you to leave the city to go to the countryside, you will have the possibility of creating a new base from A to Z or of taking buildings and fitting them out as you wish
you will have 3 small towns to explore, you will meet new inhabitants that you can help, you will have to carry out new missions

you can use all the objects already discovered, use all the crafting tables available in the game
and above all enjoy this dlc for free

every week I will post videos and screenshots of this upcoming dlc as I do for the game so you can see the game
